item.title: Python script
item.description: Let’s write something here. In particular a long formula to test the line wrapping. def test_func(x, y, z): '''A long comment line is starting this function of.''' res = x**2 + y**2 + z**2 + x*y*z + 2*x + 2*y + 2*z return res

item.title: Python stats code
item.description: First post goes here. It’s about Python. def calc(x, y): '''A simple function''' z = x + y return z
